content:
For those who would like to attend the Dynamic Languages SIG (soon to be renamed Guest Languages SIG) meetings but can't make the current Thursday 7AM PT time work, please post your availability here: https://www.when2meet.com/?20317069-mcDub
Note that the link is for the week of June 19-23, but please assume they will repeat every other week and specify your approximate availability for the series rather than just that specific week. Also, please contribute even if you're happy with the current meeting time.
